frontmatter.title: Connect to OpenShift Cluster from Windows

internal.content:
--- title: Connect to OpenShift Cluster from Windows --- ## Linux Command shell for Windows - Install WSL https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install-win10#manual-installation-steps ## Install OpenShift CLI (OC) - From OpenShift console (Infrastructure Provider), go to Command Line tools ![image](images/openshiftclient.png)

- Copy the oc link location. ![image](images/oclink.png)

- Open your Linux Command Shell and install oc tool. - For example, - wget --no-check-certificate %link location from the previous step% - tar -xvf oc.tar - sudo cp oc /usr/bin/ - oc --help ![image](images/openshiftcmd.png)

- Get your token from OpenShift console. - oc login command to login to your server. ![image](images/oclogin.png) ![image](images/octoken.png) - You should be able to run your openshift commands from here. - oc --help ( list all the commands) ![image](images/occommand.png)
